longBusinessSummary: Stylam Industries Limited manufactures and sells laminates, solid surface panels and allied products in India and internationally. The company offers decorative, post forming, electrostatic dissipative, chemical resistant, and fire retardant and laminates. It also provides specialty laminates, including digital, synchro, mirror shield, metallic, unicore, flicker, and magnetic laminates, as well as chalk and marker board products. In addition, the company offers anti-fingerprint and high gloss laminates, and anti-fingerprint and high gloss prelam boards. Further, the company provides acrylic solid surface sheets; and compact laminates, such as industrial laminates, exterior cladding, restroom cubicles, and lockers. It also exports its products to North and South America, Europe, Asia, the Far East, Africa, the Middle East, and Australia. Stylam Industries Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Chandigarh, India.
